text: <@U24GZQ3GF> Thank you so much! That was so simple and helpful! Might you be able to help me style that so that it does not go 100% width on mobile size screen (in other words, to make them stay one one row)? I'm not sure where/how it's picking up that media query. Thanks for any advice!!

<@U24GZQ3GF> I ended up putting a max-width on each icon inline styling inn the custom module code, and that solved the responsive problem! Helpful post here for anyone else: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Social-images-displaying-full-width-on-mobile/td-p/7742>
